title: London Live Bus Countdown
summary: Journey Planner & Check Live London Bus Times & find TfL Bus Stops near you
description: * Over 3,500,000 downloads on all platforms! London Bus Timing Countdown tells you when your next bus will arrive at any bus stop in London using data directly from TfL.New *Look and Feel*New *My Buses* - See Arrival times for all buses you take on one screen. New *Improved Journey Planner*New *Oyster Balance*New *Updated Android Wear support*Features:* Instant Live Bus times for Transport for London (TFL) bus stops showing when the next buses will arrive* Finds bus stops near you using your Android phone's GPS/Location Services* View nearest stops on a map or list* Automatic Refresh of Bus Times Countdown so you'll always have the most up to date information* Search for bus stops by postcode or bus stop name* Save your favourite bus stops in your Favourites for quick access* See your recent visited stops* Journey Planner shows you how to reach anywhere on the TfL Network using Buses, Tube, Trains etc.* My Buses puts all your bus routes onto one screen. Giving you bus times at a glance.* View your Oyster BalanceIf you like what we're doing, leave us a 5 star rating :)Please be aware that this app requires an internet connection and Location services for full functionality.* This app uses the Bus countdown feed from TFL, and they occasionally do maintenance in which case the application will show incomplete results.
descriptionHTML:
* Over 3,500,000 downloads on all platforms!

London Bus Timing Countdown tells you when your next bus will arrive at any bus stop in London using data directly from TfL.

New *Look and Feel*
New *My Buses* - See Arrival times for all buses you take on one screen.
New *Improved Journey Planner*
New *Oyster Balance*
New *Updated Android Wear support*

Features:
* Instant Live Bus times for Transport for London (TFL) bus stops showing when the next buses will arrive
* Finds bus stops near you using your Android phone's GPS/Location Services
* View nearest stops on a map or list
* Automatic Refresh of Bus Times Countdown so you'll always have the most up to date information
* Search for bus stops by postcode or bus stop name
* Save your favourite bus stops in your Favourites for quick access
* See your recent visited stops
* Journey Planner shows you how to reach anywhere on the TfL Network using Buses, Tube, Trains etc.
* My Buses puts all your bus routes onto one screen. Giving you bus times at a glance.
* View your Oyster Balance

If you like what we're doing, leave us a 5 star rating :)

Please be aware that this app requires an internet connection and Location services for full functionality.

* This app uses the Bus countdown feed from TFL, and they occasionally do maintenance in which case the application will show incomplete results.
comments: Just updated and on some points it just crashed. On the option/more bang crash
Really user friendly. Best bus app!

In principle, I like this app. However some improvements are needed! (#1) - All bus timetables are not available. This is hit and miss, depending on the route e.g. H25 bus timetable, not available! (#2) - Adding a bus to the widget needs to be clearer! Every time I have a need to add a new bus, I have to search the entire app to work out how to do it again. Please use a '+' symbol instead of the 3 dot crumbs icon, it would be clearer. Also, perhaps add something to the tab where my routes are stored to make it easier to add from that tab. (#3) - I have and use 3 phones. I'd like for my experience of the app to be account based, so that logging in, pulls down my settings and stored buses from the cloud. Save me having to make changes on each phone. My updates should sync across all devices seamlessly. (#4) - The app sometimes crashes when searching for a bus or road name that is valid. Please fix this. Thanks for these long overdue updates. 5 starts coming when updated üëç apart from these fixes, great app!!!
I had this app on my old phone and loved it. Since I installed on my new device it prompts me CONSTANTLY to let it access my location. There's no "stop asking" option so I'm having to uninstall it.
Works pretty well except that the Android Wear support advertised seems to be nonexistent and why the hell does it need permission to make phone calls in order to remove ads?
London live bus countdown is a very helpful app. It helps you know when your bus will leave and when you have to leave.
recentChanges: - National Rail Train Times are live!
- See bus/tube times by tapping on any stop on the map on the 'Stops' screen
- More helpful help messages on the My Routes widget
- Performance improvements to load bus times quicker during peak periods
- You can now view arrival times by tapping the bus stop on the map on the "Stops" screen
- My Routes (previously My Buses) allows Tube/Rail times too. See all your routes on one screen
